code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'../Styles/DeleteVideo.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DeleteVideo=()=>{const[videos,setVideos]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get("http://localhost:8000/components/eliminarVideo.php").then(response=>{setVideos(response.data);});},[]);const deleteVideo=id=>{const userConfirmation=window.confirm("Tem certeza que deseja eliminar este vídeo?");if(userConfirmation){axios.delete("http://localhost:8000/components/exclusaoVideo.php?id=".concat(id)).then(response=>{console.log(response.data);setVideos(videos.filter(video=>video.id!==id));alert("O vídeo foi eliminado com sucesso!");});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"delete-video",children:videos.map(video=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("video",{className:"card-video",width:"100%",height:350,controls:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("source",{src:"../components/uploadsVideos/".concat(video.video)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:video.nome}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deleteVideo(video.id),children:"Eliminar"})]},video.id))});};export default DeleteVideo;
